post.html:
This cook was a highly modified version of Bobby Flay’s Roasted Whole Turkey Breast recipe.

The Meat

The bone-in Honeysuckle White turkey breast was purchased from Schnucks frozen and thawed in the refrigerator for 1 week. It weighed 6.76 punds and at $2.89 per pound, its total price was $19.54.

Marinading the Turkey

To marinade the turkey breast, I mixed 3/4 cups of hellman’s mayonaise, 2 tablespoons of pepper, 2 tablespoons of salt, 2 tablespoons of onion powder, 2 tablespoons of garlic pepper, 4 tablespoons of mustard and 4 tablsespoons of honey. Amounts represent rough estimates that weren’t really measured.

The Cook

This cut of turkey went on the grill at 12:30pm. It was set at 350 degrees, but with winter temperatures in the teens, the temp hovered around 310-330 degrees.

1 hour in it was at 105 degrees. The ribs reached 165 at 2:30pm, for a total time on the grill at 2 hours.
